The company's software helps universities to improve retention rates by tracking and learning about their students' involvement patterns and behaviors and makes it easy to visualize and assess efforts through data, streamlines workflows for departments and student organizations, enabling universities to map and create learning outcomes to opportunities for student success.
one_liner: Developer of student engagement and learning software designed to assist in the management and assessment process. The company's software helps universities to improve retention rates by tracking and learning about their students' involvement patterns and behaviors and makes it easy to visualize and assess efforts through data, streamlines workflows for departments and student organizations, enabling universities to map and create learning outcomes to opportunities for student success.

name: Pandai Education Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a learning application designed for students to get better grades in school. The company's application provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, practice questions, and learning materials, enabling students to learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose weaknesses through a fun and engaging learning experience.
one_liner: Developer of a learning application designed for students to get better grades in school. name: Praktika.ai Company
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence platform designed to help people improve spoken English skills. The company's platform helps to prepare for a job interview in English, provides a robot that will role-play an interview and also maintain the dialogues as real interviews, provides a personal score and improvement tips, helps to improve speaking and listening skills, and enhances writing skills during chat interactions, enabling learners to receive AI language feedback and get AI-generated hints to improve language skills.

name: MCH Ventures Inc.
description: Provider of a prenatal and postpartum care management platform designed to deliver personalized, ongoing education and live support to new families everywhere. The company's care management platform is a collaboration between maternity, infant care practitioners and large health systems to connect and integrate care across a highly fragmented maternal care system comprised of hospitals, insurers, health systems and private practices, enabling patients to reduce hospital re admissions and increases breastfeeding rates.
